elements.subject: Improve the resiliency/reliability of the  Workflow Management System to decrease processing tails

description.raw: A major challenge facing the WM system is the timely completion of workflows (WFs) because of long tails in WF completion time. Failures that require human effort from which to recover comprise a major source of long workflow tails. These failures can be addressed through**reliability** (having a smaller failure rate) or**resiliency** (the ability to recover automatically in the face of failures).
description.html: A major challenge facing the WM system is the timely completion of workflows (WFs) because of long tails in WF completion time. Failures that require human effort from which to recover comprise a major source of long workflow tails. These failures can be addressed throughreliability (having a smaller failure rate) orresiliency (the ability to recover automatically in the face of failures).
